Uses of Interface
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.MetricConfigurator

Packages that use MetricConfigurator 
Package Description
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.creator
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for metrics for information propagation simulations based on the content creators.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.features.global
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for global metrics for information propagation simulations based on the user / information pieces features.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.features.indiv
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for metrics for information propagation simulations based on each user / information pieces feature.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.informationpieces
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for metrics for information propagation simulations based on the information pieces.

  • Uses of MetricConfigurator in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.creator

    Classes in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.creator that implement MetricConfigurator 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CreatorGlobalEntropyConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the entropy over the set of creators whose information has been received by each user in the network.
    class  CreatorGlobalGiniComplementConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the complement of the Gini coefficient over the set of creators whose information has been received by each user in the network.
    class  CreatorIndividualEntropyConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the entropy over the set of creators whose information has been received by each user in the network.
    class  CreatorIndividualGiniComplementConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that, for each user in the network, obtains the number of times that has that measures the complement of the Gini coefficient over the set of creators whose information has been received by each user in the network.
    class  CreatorRecallConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the fraction of people discovered by each user in the network.

  • Uses of MetricConfigurator in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.features.global

    Classes in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.features.global that implement MetricConfigurator 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ExternalFeatureGlobalGiniConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the complement of the Gini coefficient over those features unknown by the users.
    class  ExternalFeatureGlobalRateConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the proportion of the received features unknown to the users (globally)
    class  FeatureGlobalEntropyConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the proportion of the received features unknown to the users.
    class  FeatureGlobalGiniComplementConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the Gini complement over the features which have been received by the users.
    class  FeatureGlobalKLDivergenceConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the KL divergence over the features which have been received by the users.
    class  FeatureGlobalUserEntropyConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the entropy over the different features, where, for each feature, we measure the number of users who have received it.
    class  FeatureGlobalUserGiniComplementConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the complement of the Gini coefficient over the different features, where, for each feature, we measure the number of users who have received it.
    class  UserFeatureCountConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the number of different (user, feature) pairs.
    class  UserFeatureGiniComplementConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Interface for the complement of the Gini coefficient over the distribution of (user, feature) pairs.

  • Uses of MetricConfigurator in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.features.indiv

    Classes in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.features.indiv that implement MetricConfigurator 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ExternalFeatureIndividualGiniComplementConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the complement of the Gini coefficient over those features unknown by the user.
    class  ExternalFeatureIndividualRateConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the proportion of the received features unknown to the users.
    class  ExternalFeatureRecallConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the fraction of the unknown features that a user has discovered.
    class  FeatureIndividualEntropyConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the entropy of the features that a single user has received.
    class  FeatureIndividualGiniComplementConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the complement of the Gini coefficient of the features that a single user has received.
    class  FeatureIndividualKLDivergenceConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the Kullback-Leibler divergence of the features that a single user has received.
    class  FeatureRecallConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the fraction of the features that a user has discovered.

  • Uses of MetricConfigurator in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.informationpieces

    Classes in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.informationpieces that implement MetricConfigurator 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  InformationCountConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the average number of pieces received by each user.
    class  InformationGiniComplementConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures how balanced the distribution of times each information piece has been received is.
    class  RealPropagatedGlobalRecallConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the fraction of the pieces propagated in a real process which have been received.
    class  RealPropagatedIndividualRecallConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the fraction of the pieces propagated in a real process which have been received (individually for each user).
    class  SpeedConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a metric that measures the speed of the diffusion.
